thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location !
thread.title_full: Great location ! - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: AHM73
title: Great location !
text: This place was in an incredible spot. The "View of the World" terrace club on L20, breakfast spot, has an incredible view of the World Trade Centre site. You're right there next to the 9/11 Memorial and a short walk to NY Stock Exchange and Wall St. Room are decent size and clean. Really enjoyed my stay. Photo is from L20.
